short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select and open multiple links on a webpage in bulk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HyperBulk allows you to open multiple hyperlinks on a page in bulk, by selecting them all in one swift action. You simply hold ALT, then click-and-drag over the links on a page you wish to open.

This extension acts as an alternative for LinkClump.
